div.p: April 24, 2020 MHS Senior: We hope that this letter finds you healthy and safe. As you know, we are living in an unprecedented time. The COVID-19 pandemic has changed… Continue Reading Senior Commencement Letter

div.em: There are no upcoming events at this time.

em.span: To ensure all students and staff are learning at high levels.
To develop a culture of collaboration and communication that supports continuous improvement for all.

h3.span: DESIRED STATE (What we’d like students to be/do):

span.em: At MCSD, we create a positive community where students grow to be innovative risk takers who accept responsibility for their learning by setting goals and striving for continuous improvement academically and behaviorally. Our students use their talents to think critically, communicate effectively, and collaborate respectfully with others to be productive citizens. Graduates of MCSD, exhibit persistence and resiliency to produce quality results that add value in an ever-changing environment.
